snippet.title: Wonderball Heroes - Android/iOS Gameplay (HD)
snippet.description:
Join the Wonderball Heroes and help the White Rabbit get to Wonderland!

Will the White Rabbit get to Wonderland? Join the Wonderball Heroes on their bouncy journey and help the white rabbit!

Become a Wonderball Hero yourself by bouncing through levels as you unlock exciting new worlds and compete with friends.

Swipe to aim and tap to shoot the red pegs in this unique puzzle game.

Wonderball Heroes Features:
• Blue pegs unleash special power ups
• Each ball you get in the bucket rewards you with an extra move
• Special combo-shots reward you with bonus points and free balls
• Easy to play, challenging to master
• Use boosters and special power ups to help you through challenging levels
• Compete with your friends and reach the top of the leaderboards!

Already a fan of Wonderball Heroes? Like us on Facebook and get all the latest updates:
www.facebook.com/WonderballHeroes

Google Play download URL:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?hl=en&id=com.moonactive.pengi

iOS Games (iPhone - iPad - iPod Touch) :
App Store Link : https://apps.apple.com/US/app/id859987839?l=en
